name: Balanced
tooltip: Protein/Fat/Carb values in 15/35/50 ratio

name: High-Fiber
tooltip: More than 5g fiber per serving

name: High-Protein
tooltip: More than 50% of total calories from proteins

name: Low-Carb
tooltip: Less than 20% of total calories from carbs

name: Low-Fat
tooltip: Less than 15% of total calories from fat

name: Low-Sodium
tooltip: Less than 140mg Na per serving

name: Alcohol-free
tooltip: No alcohol used or contained

name: Immune-Supportive
tooltip: Recipes which fit a science-based approach to eating to strengthen the immune system

name: Celery-free
tooltip: Does not contain celery or derivatives

name: Crustcean-free
tooltip: Does not contain crustaceans (shrimp, lobster etc.) or derivatives

name: Dairy-free
tooltip: No dairy; no lactose

name: Eggs-free
tooltip: No eggs or products containing eggs

name: Fish-free
tooltip: No fish or fish derivatives

name: FODMAP free
tooltip: Does not contain FODMAP foods

name: Gluten-free
tooltip: No ingredients containing gluten

name: Keto
tooltip: Maximum 7 grams of net carbs per serving

name: Kidney friendly
tooltip: Per serving – phosphorus less than 250 mg AND potassium less than 500 mg AND sodium less than 500 mg

name: Kosher
tooltip: Contains only ingredients allowed by the kosher diet. However it does not guarantee kosher preparation of the ingredients themselves

name: Low potassium
tooltip: Less than 150mg per serving

name: Lupine-free
tooltip: Does not contain lupine or derivatives

name: Mustard-free
tooltip: Does not contain mustard or derivatives

name: Low-Fat
tooltip: Less than 3g of fat per serving

name: No oil added
tooltip: No oil added except to what is contained in the basic ingredients

name: No-sugar
tooltip: No simple sugars – glucose, dextrose, galactose, fructose, sucrose, lactose, maltose

name: Paleo
tooltip: Excludes what are perceived to be agricultural products; grains, legumes, dairy products, potatoes, refined salt, refined sugar, and processed oils

name: Peanuts-free
tooltip: No peanuts or products containing peanuts

name: Pescatarian
tooltip: Does not contain meat or meat based products, can contain dairy and fish

name: Pork-free
tooltip: Does not contain pork or derivatives

name: Red meat-free
tooltip: Does not contain beef, lamb, pork, duck, goose, game, horse, and other types of red meat or products containing red meat.

name: Sesame-free
tooltip: Does not contain sesame seed or derivatives

name: Shellfish-free
tooltip: No shellfish or shellfish derivatives

name: Soy-free
tooltip: No soy or products containing soy

name: Sugar-conscious
tooltip: Less than 4g of sugar per serving

name: Tree Nuts-free
tooltip: No tree nuts or products containing tree nuts

name: Vegan
tooltip: No meat, poultry, fish, dairy, eggs or honey

name: Vegetarian
tooltip: No meat, poultry, or fish

name: Wheat-free
tooltip: No wheat, can have gluten though
